articles.title: The Impact of Technology on Education

sentences.en: Technology has transformed the way we learn and teach in the 21st century.
sentences.zh: 科技已经改变了21世纪我们学习和教学的方式。

sentences.en: Online platforms allow students to access educational resources from anywhere in the world.
sentences.zh: 在线平台让学生可以从世界任何地方获取教育资源。

sentences.en: However, some experts argue that excessive screen time may affect students' physical health.
sentences.zh: 然而，一些专家认为过度的屏幕时间可能会影响学生的身体健康。

sentences.en: Therefore, it is important to find a balance between digital learning and traditional methods.
sentences.zh: 因此，在数字化学习和传统方法之间找到平衡是很重要的。

sentences.en: Teachers should integrate technology wisely to enhance rather than replace human interaction.
sentences.zh: 教师应该明智地整合科技，以增强而不是取代人际互动。

questions.q: What is the main idea of this passage?
options: A. Technology is harmful to education
B. Technology has changed education significantly
C. Traditional teaching methods are better
D. Students should avoid using technology
questions.analysis: 文章主要讨论了科技如何改变教育，以及需要平衡使用。

questions.q: According to the passage, what should teachers do?
options: A. Replace all traditional teaching methods
B. Avoid using technology in classrooms
C. Use technology to enhance human interaction
D. Limit students' screen time completely
questions.analysis: 文中提到教师应该明智地整合科技，以增强而不是取代人际互动。

sentences.en: Climate change is one of the most pressing challenges facing humanity today.
sentences.zh: 气候变化是当今人类面临的最紧迫挑战之一。

sentences.en: Rising global temperatures have led to melting ice caps and rising sea levels.
sentences.zh: 全球气温上升导致冰盖融化和海平面上升。

sentences.en: Many island nations are particularly vulnerable to these environmental changes.
sentences.zh: 许多岛国特别容易受到这些环境变化的影响。

sentences.en: Governments around the world have pledged to reduce carbon emissions by 2050.
sentences.zh: 世界各国政府已承诺到2050年减少碳排放。

sentences.en: But individual actions also matter significantly in addressing this global crisis.
sentences.zh: 但个人行动在应对这一全球危机方面也非常重要。

questions.q: According to the passage, who is responsible for fighting climate change?
questions.analysis: 文章提到政府承诺减排，但个人行动也很重要。
